MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG1 postcode area of Dumfries. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.30am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of broken equipment on the overhead line at Woodfarm and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.48pm on 14th January 2021..
